item.title: Timer help
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

public void spawnjad() { if (actionTimer <= 0) { actionTimer = 99999; Teleblock(); SummonNewNPC(2745); sendMessage("here he is, make sure you kill him"); } }

how can i make the action timer longer or is there a way to only make one spawn?
